Bachon
======

This project provides an example of an application of [Bacon](http://chrono.qub.ac.uk/blaauw/bacon.html). Bacon is a software that uses a Bayesian approach to model the age-depth accummulation history of sediments. Useful information can be found in  manualBacon_2.2.pdf, including where to get Bacon from. 


### Reference

Blaauw M, Andres Christen J (2011) Flexible Paleoclimate Age-Depth Models Using an Autoregressive Gamma Process. Bayesian Analysis, 6, 457-474.
